title: China: land and the people
brief_description: Discusses the similarities and differences in climate, in topography, and in crops of North and South China. Explains that the population of China is greater than that of any other country. Emphasises the importance of agriculture to the Chinese and explains that the 20th century has brought a shift towards industrialisation.
